TopicTitle: BSC - Ravenspear Mk. 1 - And the winner is...

Articles.Content: Another election ?
Well, they share the title - just brobel and Mulbin shared the second place last time.
The C-7B reminds me of my WT-19...

We have a winner!

1st place:Giggleplex777 - C-7B

2nd place:zekes - FRAK-1

3rd place:sploden - Ravenspear Mk1 improved 07

As soon as I'm at home you guys will get a nice collage

Congrats Giggleplex, A close run final there.

The Podium finishers flying in formation

Edited October 6, 2013 by Rhomphaia
Now with better picture

Congrats. I really liked that one.

So, what's next on the BSC roster? I'm getting good at optimizing my stuff quickly and am ready for the next one.
Yep ready for the next one as soon as it comes along.
Yeah, the next one come around at the end of this week probably around Thursday or Friday. Stupid University....
lol i was soooo close! Ah well, second is great considering my plane competely ignored the competition's point

Yeah, the next one come around at the end of this week probably around Thursday or Friday. Stupid University....

Thank you for giving us a little bit of a heads up. Now I know to be extra vigilant at the end of the week

Congrats. I really liked that one.

So, what's next on the BSC roster? I'm getting good at optimizing my stuff quickly and am ready for the next one.

I'm super-excited about the next BSC. Maybe Kerbal X is next?
here's a thought how about the next one be a new BSC that is not in the game right now?

I'm super-excited about the next BSC. Maybe Kerbal X is next?

i like these last few challenges because they have forced me to get better at making planes.

I also liked the challenge of making planes -- I've never been a big SPH user.

here's a thought how about the next one be a new BSC that is not in the game right now?

I can't really understand how you could have a challenge to improve on something that doesn't exist. It would just be a challenge for a new, unprecedented craft. Unless you're talking about the Ravenspear Mk.2, which doesn't exist, but could easily be extrapolated from the other Ravenspear planes that do appear in-game (or maybe from Giggleplex's winning contribution!)
hey just an idea for the op...
I won!? Wat.
*clap clap clap*
We could make a BSC competition for one of the stock landers.
Perhaps a "Heavy Lander" that is actually, you know, heavy? Fun possibilities.
Congratulation for the winner! *clap clap clap*

Perhaps a "Heavy Lander" that is actually, you know, heavy? Fun possibilities.

Challenge accepted. Shall that be the next one? Much as I have been working my butt off with planes, I want a VAB challenge again.
GG, Giggleplex777. Congrats on the win.

Perhaps a "Heavy Lander" that is actually, you know, heavy? Fun possibilities.

It depends on where you want the "Heavy Lander" to land. If it is Eve compare with Mun...It will be much "heaver"...

So, please specified the landing place...if the next BSC happend to be Heavy Lander.

Challenge accepted. Shall that be the next one? Much as I have been working my butt off with planes, I want a VAB challenge again.

Fine by me.
What are the capabilities of the stock Heavy Lander? That would be a good place to start.
